snippet.title: DLC Trailer Through the Ashes | Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
snippet.description:
Order the second story DLC for Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous on Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1889981/Pathfinder_Wrath_of_the_Righteous__Through_the_Ashes/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/ru/game/pathfinder_wrath_of_the_righteous_through_the_ashes
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/ru/p/pathfinder-wrath-of-the-righteous--through-the-ashes

Follow our official media to stay up-to-date with any and all news:
Official site: https://owlcat.games/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/owlcatgames
Discord: https://discord.gg/syqGPZH
